product_overview: WhoCrawledMe is a comprehensive AI-era intelligence platform providing real-time monitoring, tracking, and analytics of brand visibility and AI bot activities across 25+ AI platforms including ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Perplexity, and traditional web crawlers. It helps brand managers, SEO professionals, and digital marketers gain unprecedented insights into how their content performs in AI-generated responses through advanced analytics and AI-driven content optimization.
core_goals: Provide real-time AI bot detection and classification for website traffic from multiple AI platforms
Enable monitoring and detailed analytics of brand visibility and share-of-voice across AI platforms and traditional crawlers
Offer competitive intelligence with benchmarking against competitors on AI platform positioning
Deliver AI-driven content optimization and query discovery to identify trending topics and content gaps
Support website owners with comprehensive dashboards and visualizations to understand AI bot impact and optimize for Generative Engine Optimization (GEO)
key_features: Real-time Dashboard with live AI bot activity feed, confidence scores, and geographic/network intelligence
AI Platform Monitoring across 25+ platforms including ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Perplexity
Competitive Intelligence with share-of-voice market analysis and SWOT benchmarking
Query Discovery feature for trending topics and content gap identification
Brand Analytics to track mention rates, rank positions, and coverage gaps over time
Content Optimization offering AI-powered recommendations for improved platform visibility
Advanced comprehensive analytics dashboards with tabbed interfaces and filtered views
Multiple interactive charts: Brand Visibility, Share of Voice, Visits, Top Bots, Hourly Trends
Real-Time Monitoring with instant alerts and live metrics feed
Customizable Time Range Filter for date-based analysis
Robust Website Tracking API supporting JS script and pixel tracking
Modern, responsive UI design with Glass Morphism style using Radix UI and Tailwind CSS
Integration with Supabase for real-time data synchronization and PostgreSQL storage
Scalable backend API endpoints to handle analytics and tracking data
user_flow_summary: User logs into the platform and accesses the Real-time Dashboard to view live AI bot activity and key metrics
User selects date range filters to analyze historical data and trends via the Analytics Dashboard
User navigates through various analytics tabs: Brand, Competitive, AI Platforms, Queries, Content, Real-Time for specialized insights
User reviews Competitive Intelligence tab to benchmark brand visibility against competitors using share-of-voice charts
User explores Query Discovery to identify trending topics and content gaps for optimization
User reviews AI-driven Content Optimization suggestions and applies recommendations to improve AI platform visibility
User integrates the website tracking script or pixel provided into their website to enable bot visit collection
User monitors incoming bot traffic in real-time via the Real-Time Monitoring tab with alerts and live feed
User exports reports or shares insights with stakeholders through the dashboard interface
validation_criteria: Real-time AI bot detection accuracy above 95% with confidence scoring and classification
Dashboard live updates are delivered with latency under 2 seconds for real-time monitoring
API endpoints for tracking and analytics respond within 200ms under normal load
Brand visibility and competitive intelligence charts accurately reflect the data aggregated from AI bot visits
Content optimization recommendations are generated based on current data trends and user feedback
Website tracking script and pixel correctly collect visit data and integrate seamlessly with Supabase backend
UI components render consistently across supported browsers and device sizes with responsive design
Security protocols ensure user data privacy and roles-based access control are enforced
System supports subscription-tiered access with limitations on visits, retention, and API access as specified
Comprehensive logging and error handling implemented for troubleshooting and system monitoring
